Class Bunker

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity
      • Bunker

  • public class Bunker
extends Entity
    This Class lets you create a Bunker object
    Author:
    elan

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class Entity

        angle, dead, HP, index, xPos, yPos

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bunker(double x, double y, double a, int i, int hp, double w, boolean r)
      Constructor for a Bunker object

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canMoveLeft()
      Returns if the bunker can move left or not (if not, inverts its movement)
      boolean canMoveRight()
      Returns if the bunker can move right or not (if not, inverts its movement)
      double getWidth()
      Returns the width of the bunker
      static void initializeBunkers()
      creates the bunkers at the beginning of each level
      void invertMovement()
      Causes the bunker to move in the opposite direction
      void render()
      Draws the bunker on the screen
      void renderHPbar()
      Draws the bullets Health Bar
      void update()
      updates the bunker

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bunker

        public Bunker(double x,
      double y,
      double a,
      int i,
      int hp,
      double w,
      boolean r)
        Constructor for a Bunker object
        Parameters:
        x - x value where it will be created
        y - x value where it will be created
        a - angle that it will be created at
        i - the unique index it will get
        hp - the hit points it starts with
        w - the width of the bunker
        r - if the bunker is moving right initially
